PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08472018-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Federal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Regulations, 2007
PrecisRegulations Amending the FEDERAL-PROVINCIAL FISCAL ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, 2007 in order to support the legislative renewal of the Equalization and TFF programs, Implement technical changes to improve the accuracy and efficiency of the calculation of provincial and territorial entitlements under the Equalization and TFF programs and to ensure that the Statistics Canada data series used in the regulations remain current so that the Equalization and TFF formulae remain accurate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0131 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
